description: Red de Guardianes de Semillas, founded by Javier Carrera in 2002, is an informal grassroots organization in Ecuador dedicated to promoting regenerative models of life. With around 150 families across 15 provinces, the initiative focuses on food sovereignty, preserving locally adapted seeds, and fostering social justice. Through education and community engagement, the network empowers families to create sustainable alternatives in agriculture, education, and local economies, aiming for a harmonious relationship with nature.
name: Red de Guardianes de Semillas
